info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 2:22AM CDT until May 29 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Fort Worth TX
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
West Fork Trinity River Near Boyd affecting Wise County.
Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas...
West Fork Trinity River Near Jacksboro affecting Jack County.
Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County.
Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...West Fork Trinity River near Jacksboro.
* WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flooding along the river reach is expected.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 20.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning.
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/FWD.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON
